Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

Tokenisation package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized sentences from a corpus.
    TokenTag
    A marker interface for various tags that can be added on to a token by various learners (tokeniser, pos tagger, etc.)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PretokenisedSequence
    A token sequence that has been pre-tokenised by another source (manual annotation, external module, etc.).
    SimpleTokeniser
    A simplistic implementation of a Tokeniser, using only TokenFilters and default decisions.
    StringAttribute
    A TokenAttribute containing a String.
    TaggedToken<T extends TokenTag>
    A token together with a piece of information that is tagged onto it.
    TaggedTokenSequence<T extends TokenTag>
    A sequence of tagged tokens with a score.
    Token
    A token is a single parsing unit, which can have dependents and a governor.
    TokenAttribute<T extends java.io.Serializable>
    An attribute that can be tagged onto a token.
    TokenBoundary
    A marker for token annotations.
    TokenBoundaryFilter  
    TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence
    A sequence of atomic tokens tagged with tokeniser decisions, from which a series of predicted tokens can be inferred.
    Tokeniser
    A Tokeniser splits a sentence up into tokens (parsing units).

    It adds annotations of type TokenBoundary to the sentence, which are guaranteed not to overlap.

    The Tokeniser must recognise the following annotations in the sentence provided:
    TokenPlaceholder: will get replaced by a token. TokenAttribute: will add attributes to all tokens contained within its span.
    TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction, via a CorpusLineReader.
    The following placeholders are required:
    CorpusLine.CorpusElement.TOKEN
    These are included surrounded by % signs on both sides, and without the prefix "CorpusElement."
    Example (note that the regex is applied to one line, so no endline is necessary):
    TokenSequence
    A sequence of tokens.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SeparatorDecision
    A set of decisions regarding each separator.
    TokeniserOutcome
    A classification that can be assigned the tokeniser to an interval between two atomic tokens.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser Description

Tokenisation package. The main intefaces are the Tokeniser itself, and the output artefacts Token and TokenSequence.
